aliens.name: Cyborg, Metallic
aliens.description: Metallic Cyborgs are escaped former slaves turned warriors, standing nearly 7 feet tall with chrome bodies and glowing red eyes.

aliens.name: Cyborg, Replica
aliens.special: Appears completely human and is skilled in infiltration.
aliens.description: Rulers of cyborg society, these near-perfect human replicas infiltrate civilization unnoticed.

aliens.name: Falcon-Men
aliens.description: Humanoid figures with large feathered wings, often wearing robes and shouting with dramatic flair.

aliens.name: Felinoids
aliens.description: Tall feline humanoids with natural climbing claws and night vision. Agile and territorial.

aliens.name: Greys
aliens.description: Mysterious slick-skinned creatures with black eyes and telepathic abilities.

aliens.name: Mindoids
aliens.special: Detect Invisible, Detect Thoughts, Expand Senses, +2 Initiative
aliens.description: Humanlike beings with enormous craniums and immense psychic power. Emit damaging psychic bursts.

aliens.name: Odays
aliens.description: Small, wise, and riddle-speaking aliens who act as mentors to many Star Knights.

aliens.name: Procyon
aliens.special: +1 To-Hit with laser weapons and grenades
aliens.description: Aggressive raccoon-like beings with a gift for advanced weapons and tactics.

aliens.name: Qinlons
aliens.description: Honor-driven warriors with ridged foreheads and brutal melee strength.

aliens.name: Soldier
aliens.description: Generic military personnel, mercenaries, or pirates. Highly customizable per scenario.

aliens.name: Space Savages
aliens.description: Feral space marauders who scream, kill, and never negotiate. Immune to mental control.

aliens.name: Uttins
aliens.special: Ion pistol does double damage to robots
aliens.description: Rodent-like scavengers in cowls. Love salvage and wield special ion pistols.

aliens.name: Void Knight
aliens.special: Star Knight Meditations, Corrupted Energy, Force of Will (insta-kill)
aliens.description: Fallen Star Knights who wield dark power. Use Meditations and deadly psychic abilities.

aliens.name: Wolflings
aliens.description: Wolf-like humanoids who excel in packs. Gain +1 To-Hit when fighting with two or more allies.

aliens.name: Yabnabs
aliens.description: Short, bear-like primitives with an intense curiosity for the stars.
